page.title: 04SOCIAL CONCERNS Employment.
page.content: The only real bone of contention in Mathon is the fact that the lorries taking the sand and gravel from the sand pits travel too fast through the village lanes.Since there is no bus service the main mode of travel is either foot or cycle so the lorries constitute a major hazard.Offset against this is the fact that more Mathon people are employed in the sand pits than anywhere else. {Employment.} There is very little unemployment in Mathon,this is partly due to the low population and partly to the many retired people and commuters.The work within the village is nearly all either on the numerous farms or in the sand pits.
